text:
I recently started to change my eating habits, trying to be more healthy, going organic, eating the natural and raw stuff.... I stared cooking w/ this oil and found some many other uses for it, that now I am in love... I use on my hair, on my skin, my husband loves too it is amazing and w/ the subscribe and save it is even better.... great product.... I heard it is even good to use as a lubricant :-)... haven't use for that yet... but who knows....

will recommend it to anyone....
